titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to repeal the preadmission screening and resident review (PASARR) requirement for nursing facilities under the Medicaid program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 4/15/1996--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to repeal the preadmission screening and resident review requirements for mentally ill and mentally retarded individuals admitted to nursing facilities.
